attributes.action: Make all new Housing in the UK available ONLY to First Time Buyers for the next 3 Years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All new housing is being bought by rich investors. This is pricing First Time Buyers out of the Market.

The government needs to stop this innequality and make new housing available only to First Time Buyers and control the prices to make them affordable.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FirstTimeBuyers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
